allow: Bash(curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/ai-agent -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""query"": ""tell me about harry potter third book"", ""request_type"": ""specific_book""}" -s)

Bash(curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/ai-agent -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""query"": ""do you have harry potter and the chamber of secrets?"", ""request_type"": ""specific_book""}" -s)
Bash(curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/ai-agent -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""query"": ""do you have the hunger games book?"", ""request_type"": ""specific_book""}" -s)
Bash(curl -X POST http://localhost:8000/ai-agent -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{""query"": ""which books you have about romance?"", ""request_type"": ""recommendation""}" -s)
